briefTitle: E-Based Technology to Provide Decision Aid on Breast Reconstruction for Women With Breast Cance
officialTitle: The Effect of E-Based Technology to Provide Personalized Decision Aid on Breast Reconstruction for Women With Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* age of at least 20 years or under 20 years but married
* females newly diagnosed with breast cancer who are candidates for mastectomy
* ability to read and speak Taiwanese or Mandarin

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women with cancer recurrence
* poor cognitive function
* diagnosed with psychiatric disease
